thread.title: See who NAIOP recognized as Houston's top office, industrial brokers
thread.title_full: See who NAIOP recognized as Houston's top office, industrial brokers

author: Cara Smith
title: See who NAIOP recognized as Houston's top office, industrial brokers
text: 11 photos Brandon Clarke, executive vice president of CBRE, won the 2016 NAIOP Broker of the Year… more After a tough year for Houston's office and industrial markets, hundreds of commercial real estate professionals gathered at the River Oaks Country Club on Feb. 22 to recognize the industry's top office and industrial performers from 2016. The brokers were recognized as part of the 29th annual NAIOP Broker of the Year event. Click through the slideshow to see the winners of the 2016 NAIOP Brokers of the Year Awards, who were chosen based on 2016 production. 11 photos Brandon Clarke, executive vice president of CBRE, won the 2016 NAIOP Broker of the Year… more CBRE's Brandon Clarke was awarded the 2016 Broker of the Year award in the office category. Clarke, alongside Charles Gordon , Alexander Somerville , Ryan Roth and Andrew Zeplain represented Palo Alto, California-based HP Inc. (NYSE: HPQ) in its prelease of office space in Springwoods Village. Clarke was named a Houston Business Journal Heavy Hitter in 2016. Patrick Rollins , also with CBRE, won the 2016 Broker of the Year award in the industrial category. The Houston office of New York-based CBRE was well-represented throughout the night. Its brokers were represented in four of the six major awards given. Cushman & Wakefield had four brokers recognized at the event. Cara covers commercial real estate and construction for the Houston Business Journal. Follow her on Twitter for more . Home of the Day
